name: Moderskepp
description:
A top-down arcade shooter set in space! Fly around collecting modules to design your ship as enemies seek to end your life.

This project was done during the Godot Wild Jam #53, where we had to fit the theme "Assembly Required", and used the wildcards "Four Color Limit" and "Thermometer" within a 9 day span.

We didn't achieve what was desired, but it was a crazy ride and we appreciate the people taking the time to host and go through all these games!

Bugs:
Sound Settings save sound but not position on slider (I, Artist "coded" the UI)
Enemy spawning
Font breaks in Firefox Browser

Unimplemented features:
Modules snapping to other child modules
Planets
Tutorial
Soundtrack
Better AI interaction

Sounds modified from: freesound.org
